^^在这么喧闹的环境中进行谈话是不可能的。^^

^^“你旅途愉快吗？”他问道，试图找话谈。^^

^^无论索菲娅怎么引他说话，他就是一声不吭。^^

They were deep in conversation, relaxed and smiling.
^^他们谈得很投入，很放松，脸上带着微笑。^^

Once they settled in, my father looked back over his shoulder and asked the children if Santa had found them yet.
^^一旦他们在汽车里安顿了下来，爸爸转过头来问那几个孩子，圣诞老人是否找到了他们。^^
Try something new whether it’s a gift or an experience so you can keep the years from becoming a blur. This will always be the year that I first dressed up like Santa.
^^不管是一件礼物还是一次体验，尝试新的东西可以让那些美好的日子不至于那么快消散，我第一次当圣诞老人的这一年亦将成为记忆中的永恒。^^
"},"$:/PEPChuZhong9_1/Charles Dickens_74":{"title":"$:/PEPChuZhong9_1/Charles Dickens_74","word":"Charles Dickens","tags":"?","caption":"{{||$:/plugins/oflg/fishing-cannedfish-PEPChuZhong9_1/Word}}","created":"20220405060758733","transCn":"查尔斯 • 狄更斯（英国作家）
